ovdesc.p: The application allows the user to specify the 'grouping' criteria for REPO contracts that require delivery messages to be 'netted'.
The REPO application contains a field indicating the 'netted/grouped' status of the individual contract as determined by the criteria in this application.

desc.p: This Multi-value field determines which fields from REPO must match when considering grouping REPO transactions together.
This field is combined with the SYSTEM.FIELD to provide the basis for matching like transactions.
A valid field from the REPO application.
This field can be used to default selection fields into the SC.GROUP.TRADES application.
